messages.messageBody:
Thomas -
Thanks for that, interesting stuff. Anybody know what a "Warpecker"
is? I googled it and this is the only time I have seen a google
search come back with only 2 pages, none of them useful...
-t

>
> Cheers
> Thomas

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] 18 Arts of the Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: To Tom: My source was the site mentioned in the post: http://judoforum.com/blog/joseverson/index.php?&req=printentry&eid=85
messages.messageBody:
To Tom:
My source was the site mentioned in the post:
http://judoforum.com/blog/joseverson/index.php?&req=printentry&eid=85
<http://judoforum.com/blog/joseverson/index.php?&req=printentry&eid=85>
, which I found via an extensive google research using words like "the
18 (ancient) arts of samurai" and "bugei juhappan".

Cheers
Thomas

----------
Tom Helm wrote:
> Thomas,
> great stuff. I wonder what is your source and does it say whether
> this list is pre- or post- 1600?
> thanks,
> -t

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] 18 Arts of the Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: Thomas, great stuff. I wonder what is your source and does it say whether this list is pre- or post- 1600? thanks, -t
messages.messageBody:
Thomas,
great stuff. I wonder what is your source and does it say whether
this list is pre- or post- 1600?
thanks,
-t

messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] 18 Arts of the Samurai
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Chameera, Finally I ve found an answer to your question: http://judoforum.com/blog/joseverson/index.php?&req=printentry&eid=85 I quote here: 01. JÅª-JUTSU
messages.messageBody:
Hi Chameera,
Finally I've found an answer to your question:
http://judoforum.com/blog/joseverson/index.php?&req=printentry&eid=85

I quote here:

01. JŪ-JUTSU / KENPŌ 柔術 拳法 "Unarmed defense arts"
02. KEN-JUTSU / GEKKEN-JUTSU 剣術 "Sword arts"
03. IAI-JUTSU / BATTŌ-JUTSU 居合術 "Sword drawing arts"
04. KUSARIFUNDŌ-JUTSU 鎖分銅術 "Weighted chain art"
05. KUSARIGAMA-JUTSU 鎖鎌術 "Sickle-and-chain art"
06. BŌ-JUTSU 棒術 "Full staff art"
07. SŌ-JUTSU 創術 "Spear art"
08. NAGINATA-JUTSU 長刀術 "Halberd art"
09. SUIREN 水蓮 "Swimming"
10. BA-JUTSU 馬術 "Horsemanship art"
11. KISHA-JUTSU 騎弓術 "Horseback archery art"
12. JŌ-JUTSU 杖術 "three-quarter staff art"
13. KYŪ-JUTSU 弓術 "Archery art"
14. YOROI-KUMI-UCHI 鎧組打 "Fighting in armour art"
15. HOJŌ-JUTSU / HOBAKU-JUTSU 捕縄術 "Tieing with ropes arts"
16. JITTE-JUTSU 十手術 "Iron rod art"
17. HŌ-JUTSU ?術 "Illusion Art" or (砲術 "Artillery Art")
18. NAGE-KEN-JUTSU / SHURIKEN-JUTSU 投剣術 手裏剣術 "Blade throwing arts"

-----------
Asanga Chameera wrote:
> Hi Everyone,
>
> My name is Chameera , I'm a 29 year old martial arts student from Sri
> Lanka.
>
> I would like to know , what were the 18 arts of the Samurai ?
>
>
>
> Best Regards
>
> Chameera
>
> Sri Lanka
